Payment Terms :
* Payment terms 15 Days with PDC.
* Payment should make by way of Draft/Cheque drawn on a scheduled bank in favour of “Demo Company” Payable at --.
* Interest @ 24% per annum would be applicable if the payment exceeds the agreed upon terms.

Delivery Terms :
* We would request you to give us a schedule of 3 to 4 day’s concrete requirements in advance so as to enable smooth execution of the operation. We shall accommodate your valued orders on shorter notice also, subject to availability of the requested time /date.
* We will not be able to supply during traffic restriction hours, Our responsibility is to dispatch the required qty of RMC to your site, Once the RMC reaches the site ,the pouring of RMC can be done at your advice.
* Since the Concrete is perishable item, any unutilized concrete, after truck has left from our premises would be chargeable.
* Pumping charge : below 0.0 cum Rs. 0.0/-
* Note: For further Terms & Conditions kindly refer annexure (A) We do not owe any responsibility for damage to any equipment or Injury or any loss to human on this account. Our scope is limited to supply of RMC and rest responsibility lies with customer who had placed the order for the supply of RMC.
* Note: Any statutory changes above will be effected to the rate quoted. We assure you of our best service as always and looking forward to a long term association with you. Further clarification please feels free contact with the following number.

Terms and condition :
1. The above price is inclusive of GST 18%
2. Any statutory increases in taxes will be in your account.
3. Any police permission or local permission for our vehicle to enter into your site and execute the work in your site will be from your end.
4. Minimum quantity per pour for pump is 25 cum and 6 cum for manual.
5. The supplies will be made on volumetric basis as per reports generated by our computer and will be Charged accordingly.
6. Please note that rates mentioned above are uniform for both pumping and dumping. Incase our pumps are not available and you deploy your pump, in such case there will not be any discount.
7. We assure you that of the concrete. Test results for 28 days of compressive strength would provide.
8. Validity of quotation 15 days.
9. The above rates for supplies up to 5 th floor additional charges above the quoted price will be changed as under:
10. The concrete above M35 grade should be consumed within 120 minutes from the time of batching as per IS specifications since PCE admixtures are used the work ability will get dropper beyond 2 hours in fast manner and we advice not to use the concrete beyond 120 minutes and normal concrete up to M30 grade maximum time for consumption not exceeding 180 minutes ( Any use of concrete beyond the advised period will be at the risk of customer we will not be held responsible for any quality issue in such cases)
11. Manufacturing would be the responsibility of BIHAR RMC, gaining of the characteristic strength is a function of compaction, curing, type of forms and other factors that are beyond the scope of BIHAR RMC.
12. Concrete in the transit mixer should unload within 30 minutes after arrival at Site.
13. Vehicle should not detain for more than one hour from the reaching at the site. And if it delay more one hour after we are not responsible for any quality issues.
14. The above price is depending upon current cement rates, when cement rates variation RMC rates also changing.
